title: Red Dragonborn
entryLore: Descended from the arrogant and covetous red dragons of the mountain peaks, these dragonborn command the power of fire. They often possess a fierce pride and a thirst for power, reflecting the domineering and often temperamental nature of their draconic kin.

traits.name: Fire Breath (Red)
traits.description: When you use your [[breath_weapon|Breath Weapon]], it deals [[fire_damage|Fire damage]]. You choose whether the breath manifests as a 15-foot cone or a 30-foot line.
